name: Monsters in Trucks
description:
A misguided monster invasion becomes a raucous road trip through life on earth. Choose from a menagerie of mischievous monsters and a ton of terrible trucks, and come along on this contemptible cruise through the countryside!

Monsters in Trucks is a side-scrolling driving game for kids, grown-ups and everyone in between. You race through challenges and scenarios, doing radical stunts and gonzo tricks along the way. Complete the story to unlock new levels, or go for a high score to unlock new characters and vehicles!

The game feature NO in-app purchases ever! Instead it features an innovative card-trading system which allows players to wager and trade cards with one another. Only available across local network (via Apple MultiPeer), this feature encourages face-to-face competition and fun. Maybe it saves mankind.
